item.title: Hello World
item.author: kangnahua [at] gmail dot com (Nahua Kang)
item.description: This is a blog post placeholder until I have real content. For now, let me say to you in Python: print("Hello World!") In Ruby: puts "Hello World!" In Javascript: console.log("Hello World!") In Go: package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Hello World!") } And in Clojure: (println "Hello World")
